content.original: Dug in Deep
content.prevOriginal: Dug in Deep
content.content: Глубоко закопанный

content.original: Landing site secure. Let's do what we agreed, Commander. Scout out that data relay and take it from there. Good luck.
content.prevOriginal: Landing site secure. Let's do what we agreed, Commander. Scout out that data relay and take it from there. Good luck.
content.content: Зона высадки безопасна. Давайте сделаем то, о чем договорились, командир. Найдите этот ретранслятор данных и возьмите его оттуда. Удачи.

content.original: Great job, Commander! Now they can re-establish their data relay.
content.prevOriginal: Great job, Commander! Now they can re-establish their data relay.
content.content: Отличная работа, командир! Теперь они могут восстановить ретрансляцию данных.

content.original: The loss of that data cache and relay station is bad news for {TEAM_EMP.FactionDef.ShortName}. Let's figure out our next step.
content.prevOriginal: The loss of that data cache and relay station is bad news for {TEAM_EMP.FactionDef.ShortName}. Let's figure out our next step.
content.content: Потеря кэша данных и ретрансляционной станции - плохая новость для {TEAM_EMP.FactionDef.ShortName}. Давайте разберемся с нашим следующим шагом.

content.original: No wonder the data steam cut off. This place has been slagged. Maybe there's more we can find out in the main compound.
content.prevOriginal: No wonder the data steam cut off. This place has been slagged. Maybe there's more we can find out in the main compound.
content.content: No wonder the data steam cut off. This place has been slagged. Maybe there's more we can find out in the main compound.

content.original: *** DETECTED INCOMING FORCES OF UNKNOWN ORIGIN ****  ...  *** RED ALERT STATUS ***
content.prevOriginal: *** DETECTED INCOMING FORCES OF UNKNOWN ORIGIN ****  ...  *** RED ALERT STATUS ***
content.content: *** ОБНАРУЖЕНЫ ПРИБЛИЖАЮЩИЕСЯ НЕОПОЗНАННЫЕ ЦЕЛИ **** ... *** БОЕВАЯ ТРЕВОГА! ***

content.original: Red alert status for unknown forces? They've got their defenses fully primed. What's going on?!
content.prevOriginal: Red alert status for unknown forces? They've got their defenses fully primed. What's going on?!
content.content: Боевая тревого для неизвестных сил? У них отличное бронирование. Что происходит?!

content.original: A lance of mechs?! We were told to expect minor resistance. Shit... Lance! Engage!
content.prevOriginal: A lance of mechs?! We were told to expect minor resistance. Shit... Lance! Engage!
content.content: Отряд мехов?! Нам сказали ожидать незначительного сопротивление. Дерьмо... Отряд! Вступаем в бой!

content.original: Looks like we've walked into a full assault, Commander. Contacts are hostile and incoming.
content.prevOriginal: Looks like we've walked into a full assault, Commander. Contacts are hostile and incoming.
content.content: Похоже, вы начали полноценный штурм, командир. Враждебные контакты, и прибилижаются.

content.original: At least this data relay has some kind of turret defenses. They're booting up now.
content.prevOriginal: At least this data relay has some kind of turret defenses. They're booting up now.
content.content: По крайней мере, у этого ретранслятора данных есть какая-то защита из турелей. Они сейчас загружаются.

content.original: Is everything ok down there, Commander? Looks like those turrets were hacked. Something is definitely not right here. Let's move on to the next base.
content.prevOriginal: Is everything ok down there, Commander? Looks like those turrets were hacked. Something is definitely not right here. Let's move on to the next base.
content.content: Внизу все в порядке, командир? Похоже, эти турели взломали. Что-то здесь точно не так. Переходим к следующей базе.

content.original: We either came at the right time or the worst time. Good job on dispatching that assault. I fear that's not the last of them though. Expect more OpFor, Commander.
content.prevOriginal: We either came at the right time or the worst time. Good job on dispatching that assault. I fear that's not the last of them though. Expect more OpFor, Commander.
content.content: Либо мы пришли в нужное время, либо не вовремя. Неплохо поработали отражению нападения. Боюсь, что это не все. Ожидайте еще противников, командир.

content.original: {COMPANY.CompanyName}! We weren't expecting to see you - in one piece, anyway. What a sight for sore eyes. Welcome to the front lines!
content.prevOriginal: {COMPANY.CompanyName}! We weren't expecting to see you - in one piece, anyway. What a sight for sore eyes. Welcome to the front lines!
content.content: {COMPANY.CompanyName}! Мы не ожидали увидеть тебя - во всяком случае, в целости и сохранности. Какое зрелище для уставших глаз. Добро пожаловать на передовую!

content.original: Front lines? Lucky us. We've been sent by {TEAM_EMP.FactionDef.ShortName} to aid and assist. How are you all doing in there? What's the sitrep?
content.prevOriginal: Front lines? Lucky us. We've been sent by {TEAM_EMP.FactionDef.ShortName} to aid and assist. How are you all doing in there? What's the sitrep?
content.content: Линия фронта? Нам повезло. {TEAM_EMP.FactionDef.ShortName} послал нас для поддержки и помощи. Как у вас там дела? Какова обстановка?

content.original: We first noticed our data streams were being interrupted then had the odd scout probe our defenses. You arrived right on time for the main event it seems.
content.prevOriginal: We first noticed our data streams were being interrupted then had the odd scout probe our defenses. You arrived right on time for the main event it seems.
content.content: Сначала мы заметили, что наши потоки данных прерываются, а затем странный разведчик прозондировал нашу защиту. Похоже, вы прибыли как раз к главному событию.

content.original: We've got contacts! Incoming!
content.prevOriginal: We've got contacts! Incoming!
content.content: У нас контакт! Наступают!

content.original: Interrupted mid-stream? Not much does that, Commander. We better be ready for anything down there.
content.prevOriginal: Interrupted mid-stream? Not much does that, Commander. We better be ready for anything down there.
content.content: Прерванная трансляция? Не густо, командир. Лучше быть готовыми ко всему внизу.

content.original: Establish SitRep
content.prevOriginal: Establish SitRep
content.content: Доложить обстановку

content.original: Survive the turrets in alpha base
content.prevOriginal: Survive the turrets in alpha base
content.content: Защитить турели на базе альфа

content.original: Survive the defenses
content.prevOriginal: Survive the defenses
content.content: Survive the defenses

content.original: Link up with the main compound
content.prevOriginal: Link up with the main compound
content.content: Связаться с основным соединением

content.original: Link up with the main compound
content.prevOriginal: Link up with the main compound
content.content: Связаться с основным соединением

content.original: Destroy the lance that is invading
content.prevOriginal: Destroy the lance that is invading
content.content: Уничтожьте вторгающиеся силы врага

content.original: Destroy invading lance
content.prevOriginal: Destroy invading lance
content.content: Уничтожить отряд вторжения

content.original: Survive the hacked turrets in bravo base
content.prevOriginal: Survive the hacked turrets in bravo base
content.content: Защитить взломанные турели на базе браво

content.original: Destroy the hacked base turrets
content.prevOriginal: Destroy the hacked base turrets
content.content: Уничтожьте турели взломанной базы

content.original: Last week, radio coms with a strategic outpost was interrupted mid datastream to one of the remote relays and we've been unable to reestablish contact. Our other units are all tied up, so we need you to make contact and get a sitrep.
content.prevOriginal: Last week, radio coms with a strategic outpost was interrupted mid datastream to one of the remote relays and we've been unable to reestablish contact. Our other units are all tied up, so we need you to make contact and get a sitrep.
content.content: На прошлой неделе связь с аванпостом была прервана в середине передачи данных к одному из ретрансляторов, мы не смогли восстановить связь. Все наши подразделения заняты, поэтому нам нужно, чтобы вы установили контакт и доложили ситуацию.

content.original: Heavy Static
content.prevOriginal: Heavy Static
content.content: Тяжелая статика

content.original: We've received very little intel on this situation. We just know they went dark and we assume jamming is involved. Careful out there, Commander.
content.prevOriginal: We've received very little intel on this situation. We just know they went dark and we assume jamming is involved. Careful out there, Commander.
content.content: Мы получили очень мало разведданных. Мы просто знаем, что они пропали, и, предполагаю, речь идет о помехах. Осторожно, командир.

content.original: Great job, Commander! They always say you can't judge these types of contracts.
content.prevOriginal: Great job, Commander! They always say you can't judge these types of contracts.
content.content: Отличная работа, командир! Они всегда говорят, что о таких контрактах нельзя судить сходу.

content.original: It's me again, Commander! I've managed to activate our base defenses. Locked them all shortly before we lost control. Give them hell!
content.prevOriginal: It's me again, Commander! I've managed to activate our base defenses. Locked them all shortly before we lost control. Give them hell!
content.content: Это снова я, командир! Мне удалось активировать оборону базы. Мы заблокировали ее незадолго до того, как потеряли контроль. Задайте им жару!

content.original: Commander! Are we glad to see you! {TEAM_EMP.FactionDef.Demonym} forward base {TGT_SYSTEM.name}-Alpha.
content.prevOriginal: Commander! Are we glad to see you! {TEAM_EMP.FactionDef.Demonym} forward base {TGT_SYSTEM.name}-Alpha.
content.content: Командир! Как мы рады вас видеть! {TEAM_EMP.FactionDef.Name} передовая база {TGT_SYSTEM.name}-Альфа.

content.original: We've been holding off assaults on our position for the past few weeks. We've fallen back to this base but we can't hold out for much longer.
content.prevOriginal: We've been holding off assaults on our position for the past few weeks. We've fallen back to this base but we can't hold out for much longer.
content.content: Последние несколько недель мы сдерживали нападения на нашу позицию. Мы отступили на эту базу, но долго не продержимся.

content.original: We've got contacts! Incoming!
content.prevOriginal: We've got contacts! Incoming!
content.content: Множество контактов! Сближаются!

content.original: The loss of that position will come at a bad time for {TEAM_EMP.FactionDef.ShortName}. No good news for us either.
content.prevOriginal: The loss of that position will come at a bad time for {TEAM_EMP.FactionDef.ShortName}. No good news for us either.
content.content: Потеря этой позиции наступит в неподходящее время для {TEAM_EMP.FactionDef.ShortName}. Для нас тоже.

content.original: Strange. There looks like there's been fighting here but it was a least a few weeks ago. Let's look up on ahead. Maybe we'll find something at the other base.
content.prevOriginal: Strange. There looks like there's been fighting here but it was a least a few weeks ago. Let's look up on ahead. Maybe we'll find something at the other base.
content.content: Странно. Похоже, здесь шел бой, но это было, по крайней мере, несколько недель назад. Давайте посмотрим дальше. Может, найдем что-нибудь на другой базе.

content.original: What's this?! The turrets are activating. Incoming fire, Commander!
content.prevOriginal: What's this?! The turrets are activating. Incoming fire, Commander!
content.content: Что это?! Турели активируются. Огонь на поражение, командир!

content.original: We were told to expect interference. Time to shut you out.
content.prevOriginal: We were told to expect interference. Time to shut you out.
content.content: We were told to expect interference. Time to shut you out.

content.original: This isn't good, Commander. You're surrounded!
content.prevOriginal: This isn't good, Commander. You're surrounded!
content.content: Это нехорошо, командир. Вы окружены!

content.original: Hey! That base's automated turrets are spinning up. Lucky us!
content.prevOriginal: Hey! That base's automated turrets are spinning up. Lucky us!
content.content: Эй! Автоматические турели этой базы начали вращатся. Нам повезло!

content.original: Is everything ok down there, Commander? Looks like those turrets were hacked. Something is definitely not right here. Let's move on to the next base.
content.prevOriginal: Is everything ok down there, Commander? Looks like those turrets were hacked. Something is definitely not right here. Let's move on to the next base.
content.content: Внизу все в порядке, командир? Похоже, эти турели взломали. Что-то здесь точно не так. Переходим к следующей базе.

content.original: How did these guys get the jump on us? We've been getting too much bad intel. This is now officially a hot zone. Let's continue our investigation. Expect more OpFor, Commander.
content.prevOriginal: How did these guys get the jump on us? We've been getting too much bad intel. This is now officially a hot zone. Let's continue our investigation. Expect more OpFor, Commander.
content.content: How did these guys get the jump on us? We've been getting too much bad intel. This is now officially a hot zone. Let's continue our investigation. Expect more OpFor, Commander.

content.original: Unidentified BattleMech lance. Declare yourself. You are violating a {TEAM_EMP.FactionDef.Demonym} militarised zone
content.prevOriginal: Unidentified BattleMech lance. Declare yourself. You are violating a {TEAM_EMP.FactionDef.Demonym} militarised zone
content.content: Неопознанное копье мехов. Обозначте себя. Вы нарушаете миллитаризированную зону {TEAM_EMP.FactionDef.Name}

content.original: {TEAM_EMP.FactionDef.Demonym} radio operator. We are {COMPANY.CompanyName} and have been hired to check the sit rep here. You've been out of contact for weeks. Everything ok here?
content.prevOriginal: {TEAM_EMP.FactionDef.Demonym} radio operator. We are {COMPANY.CompanyName} and have been hired to check the sit rep here. You've been out of contact for weeks. Everything ok here?
content.content: {TEAM_EMP.FactionDef.Name} радист. Мы - {COMPANY.CompanyName}, и нас наняли, чтобы проверить, есть ли здесь местный представитель. nym} радист. Мы-КОМПАНИЯ.CompanyName} и были наняты для проверки сидячего представителя здесь. Ты уже несколько недель не выходишь на связь. Здесь все в порядке?

content.original: Everything's fi..***STATIC***
content.prevOriginal: Everything's fi..***STATIC***
content.content: Все в поря...***ШУМ***

content.original: Commander! It's a trap! Watch ou...***STATIC***
content.prevOriginal: Commander! It's a trap! Watch ou...***STATIC***
content.content: Командир! Это ловушка! Осторож...*** ПОМЕХИ ***

content.original: Damn it! Gun them down now!
content.prevOriginal: Damn it! Gun them down now!
content.content: Черт возьми! Пристрелите их сейчас же!

content.original: It's me again, Commander! I'm going to try and activate the turrets... ***BANG***
content.prevOriginal: It's me again, Commander! I'm going to try and activate the turrets... ***BANG***
content.content: Это снова я, командир! Я собираюсь попробовать включить турели... *** БАХ ***

content.original: That sorts you out. Thanks for unlocking those turrets for us.
content.prevOriginal: That sorts you out. Thanks for unlocking those turrets for us.
content.content: That sorts you out. Thanks for unlocking those turrets for us.

content.original: Commander, this isn't good. Watch out for those base defenses!
content.prevOriginal: Commander, this isn't good. Watch out for those base defenses!
content.content: Командир, это нехорошо. Следите за обороной базы!

content.original: Forward base is a little misleading, Commander. I've heard rumours it's more a spy station. Let's go find out what's going on.
content.prevOriginal: Forward base is a little misleading, Commander. I've heard rumours it's more a spy station. Let's go find out what's going on.
content.content: Передовая база вводит в заблуждение, командир. Ходят слухи, что это больше шпионская станция. Давайте выясним, что происходит.

content.original: Investigate the Blackout
content.prevOriginal: Investigate the Blackout
content.content: Investigate the Blackout

content.original: Survive the turret trap in alpha base
content.prevOriginal: Survive the turret trap in alpha base
content.content: Survive the turret trap in alpha base

content.original: Survive the trap
content.prevOriginal: Survive the trap
content.content: Survive the trap

content.original: Follow the trail to the next base
content.prevOriginal: Follow the trail to the next base
content.content: Иди по следу до следующей базы

content.original: Follow the Trail
content.prevOriginal: Follow the Trail
content.content: Иди по следу

content.original: Destroy the lance that is invading
content.prevOriginal: Destroy the lance that is invading
content.content: Уничтожьте вторгающиеся силы врага

content.original: Destroy invading lance
content.prevOriginal: Destroy invading lance
content.content: Уничтожить отряд вторжения

content.original: Destroy the lance that is occupying the base
content.prevOriginal: Destroy the lance that is occupying the base
content.content: Уничтожьте отряд, удерживающий базу

content.original: Destroy occupying lance
content.prevOriginal: Destroy occupying lance
content.content: Уничтожить отряд захватчиков

content.original: Survive the hacked turrets in bravo base
content.prevOriginal: Survive the hacked turrets in bravo base
content.content: Защитить взломанные турели на базе браво

content.original: Destroy the hacked base turrets
content.prevOriginal: Destroy the hacked base turrets
content.content: Уничтожьте турели взломанной базы

content.original: We recently lost contact with one of our forward bases in the {TGT_SYSTEM.name} system. We've heard rumours of {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.Demonym} activity near here so it might be related. We need you to go in and investigate for us.
content.prevOriginal: We recently lost contact with one of our forward bases in the {TGT_SYSTEM.name} system. We've heard rumours of {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.Demonym} activity near here so it might be related. We need you to go in and investigate for us.
content.content: Недавно мы потеряли связь с одной из наших баз в системе {TGT_SYSTEM.name}. До нас дошли слухи об активности {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.Name} поблизости, так что это может быть связано. Нам нужно, чтобы вы провели разведку.

content.original: Unknown Cause
content.prevOriginal: Unknown Cause
content.content: Неизвестная причина

content.original: We've been informed there's two main bases for the Biolab. Let's head to the first one and scout it out. And... try not to take any deep breaths out there, Commander.
content.prevOriginal: We've been informed there's two main bases for the Biolab. Let's head to the first one and scout it out. And... try not to take any deep breaths out there, Commander.
content.content: Нам сообщили, что у Биолаборатории есть две основные базы. Давайте отправимся к первому и разведем его. И ... постарайтесь не делать глубоких вдохов, командир.

content.original: Good job there, Commander. Let's hope that {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.Demonym} crew weren't right about that virus.
content.prevOriginal: Good job there, Commander. Let's hope that {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.Demonym} crew weren't right about that virus.
content.content: Хорошая работа, командир. Будем надеяться, что команда {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.Name} была не права насчет вируса.

content.original: *** DETECTED OCCUPYING FORCE *** ... *** VIRUS DETECTED ON OCCUPYING UNITS *** .... *** ACTIVATING DEVICE NETWORK ***
content.prevOriginal: *** DETECTED OCCUPYING FORCE *** ... *** VIRUS DETECTED ON OCCUPYING UNITS *** .... *** ACTIVATING DEVICE NETWORK ***
content.content: *** ОБНАРУЖЕНА ОККУПАЦИОННЫЕ СИЛЫ *** ... *** ВИРУС ОБНАРУЖЕН НА ОККУПИРУЮЩИХ ЮНИТАХ*** .... *** АКТИВАЦИЯ СЕТИ УСТРОЙСТВ ***

content.original: Commander! Are we glad to see you! {TEAM_EMP.FactionDef.Demonym} Biolab {TGT_SYSTEM.name}-Delta.
content.prevOriginal: Commander! Are we glad to see you! {TEAM_EMP.FactionDef.Demonym} Biolab {TGT_SYSTEM.name}-Delta.
content.content: Командир! Как мы рады вас видеть! {TEAM_EMP.FactionDef.Name} Биолаборатория {TGT_SYSTEM.name}-Дельта.

content.original: We had a containment breach on one of our projects. Nothing serious I assure you and we have it under control. However, it looks like we've pushed the {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.Demonym} watchers too far. They're determined to wipe us out!
content.prevOriginal: We had a containment breach on one of our projects. Nothing serious I assure you and we have it under control. However, it looks like we've pushed the {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.Demonym} watchers too far. They're determined to wipe us out!
content.content: У нас было нарушение условий содержания на одном из наших проектов. Ничего серьезного, уверяю вас все под контролем. Однако похоже, что мы зашли слишком далеко от требований наблюдателей {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.Name}. Они полны решимости уничтожить нас!

content.original: We've got contacts! Incoming!
content.prevOriginal: We've got contacts! Incoming!
content.content: Множество контактов! Сближаются!

content.original: This virus will be a problem now, Commander. Let's get you back.
content.prevOriginal: This virus will be a problem now, Commander. Let's get you back.
content.content: This virus will be a problem now, Commander. Let's get you back.

content.original: There are a few dead bodies scattered around the base here, Commander. I hate to say it but maybe there's something going on with this biolab. Let's check the biolab complex.
content.prevOriginal: There are a few dead bodies scattered around the base here, Commander. I hate to say it but maybe there's something going on with this biolab. Let's check the biolab complex.
content.content: Около базы обнаружено несколько трупов, командир. Я не хочу это говорить, но, может быть, в биолаборатории что-то происходит. Давайте проверим комплекс биолабораторий.

content.original: *** DETECTED UNKNOWN FORCE *** ... *** VIRUS BREACH DETECTED *** .... *** ACTIVATING DEVICE NETWORK ***
content.prevOriginal: *** DETECTED UNKNOWN FORCE *** ... *** VIRUS BREACH DETECTED *** .... *** ACTIVATING DEVICE NETWORK ***
content.content: *** ОБНАРУЖЕНА НЕИЗВЕСТНАЯ СИЛА *** ... *** ОБНАРУЖЕНО РАСПРОСТРАНЕНИЕ ВИРУСА *** .... *** АКТИВАЦИЯ СЕТИ УСТРОЙСТВ ***

content.original: Watch out, Commander! Turrets coming online!
content.prevOriginal: Watch out, Commander! Turrets coming online!
content.content: Осторожно, командир! Турели активируются!

content.original: We knew your damned experiments here would ruin us, {TEAM_EMP.FactionDef.Demonym}. Now you've released that virus and killed us all. At least we'll take you with us first.
content.prevOriginal: We knew your damned experiments here would ruin us, {TEAM_EMP.FactionDef.Demonym}. Now you've released that virus and killed us all. At least we'll take you with us first.
content.content: Мы знали, что ваши чертовы эксперименты нас погубят, {TEAM_EMP.FactionDef.Name}. Теперь вы выпустили этот вирус и убили всех нас. Но по крайней мере, мы заберем вас с собой.

content.original: Virus? Commander, incoming hostiles!
content.prevOriginal: Virus? Commander, incoming hostiles!
content.content: Вирус? Тут враги наступают, командир!

content.original: *** DETECTED UNKNOWN FORCE *** ... *** VIRUS DETECTED *** .... *** ACTIVATING DEVICE NETWORK ***
content.prevOriginal: *** DETECTED UNKNOWN FORCE *** ... *** VIRUS DETECTED *** .... *** ACTIVATING DEVICE NETWORK ***
content.content: *** ОБНАРУЖЕНА НЕИЗВЕСТНАЯ СИЛА *** ... *** ОБНАРУЖЕН ВИРУС *** .... *** АКТИВАЦИЯ СЕТИ УСТРОЙСТВ ***

content.original: What was all that about a virus? To be on the safe side I wouldn't leave your mechs whilst you're down there. Let's move to the biolab complex to figure this out.
content.prevOriginal: What was all that about a virus? To be on the safe side I wouldn't leave your mechs whilst you're down there. Let's move to the biolab complex to figure this out.
content.content: Так это все вирус? На всякий случай я бы покидал мех, пока вы там. Давайте выдвигаться к комплексу биолабораторий, чтобы разобраться с этим.

content.original: A {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.Demonym} attack? Virus? What the hell is going on here? Let's get this over with fast.
content.prevOriginal: A {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.Demonym} attack? Virus? What the hell is going on here? Let's get this over with fast.
content.content: Атака {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.Name}? Вирус? Что, черт возьми, здесь происходит? Давайте побыстрее покончим с этим.

content.original: Unidentified BattleMech lance. This base has been put under quarantine by {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.ShortName}. Leave this area now.
content.prevOriginal: Unidentified BattleMech lance. This base has been put under quarantine by {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.ShortName}. Leave this area now.
content.content: Неопознанное копье мехов. Эта база помещена на карантин {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.ShortName}. Покиньте это место сейчас же.

content.original: {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.Demonym} radio operator. You have illegally taken over this {TEAM_EMP.FactionDef.Demonym} base. Leave or be forced out.
content.prevOriginal: {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.Demonym} radio operator. You have illegally taken over this {TEAM_EMP.FactionDef.Demonym} base. Leave or be forced out.
content.content: {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.Name} сообщает. Вы незаконно захватили эту базу {TEAM_EMP.FactionDef.Name}. Уходите или вас вышвырнут.

content.original: You leave us no choice. Contain and control those Mercs!
content.prevOriginal: You leave us no choice. Contain and control those Mercs!
content.content: Вы не оставляете нам выбора. Сдерживайте и следите за этими наемниками!

content.original: Watch out, Commander! Base defenses are coming online!
content.prevOriginal: Watch out, Commander! Base defenses are coming online!
content.content: Осторожно, командир! Оборона базы активировалась!

content.original: Bio research station? We better be careful here, Commander. I don't fancy catching a new type of cold, if you know what I mean?
content.prevOriginal: Bio research station? We better be careful here, Commander. I don't fancy catching a new type of cold, if you know what I mean?
content.content: Биологическая исследовательская станция? Лучше быть здесь поосторожнее, командир. Я не хочу заболеть новым типом простуды, если вы понимаете, о чем я?

content.original: Investigate the Biolab
content.prevOriginal: Investigate the Biolab
content.content: Исследуйте Биолаб

content.original: Survive the bioscan in alpha base
content.prevOriginal: Survive the bioscan in alpha base
content.content: Защитить биоскан на базе альфа

content.original: Survive the bioscan
content.prevOriginal: Survive the bioscan
content.content: Защитить биоскан

content.original: Head to the biolab in the next base
content.prevOriginal: Head to the biolab in the next base
content.content: Отправляйтесь в биолаб. на следующей базе

content.original: Head to the Biolab complex
content.prevOriginal: Head to the Biolab complex
content.content: Отправляйтесь в комплекс Биолаб

content.original: Destroy the lance that is invading
content.prevOriginal: Destroy the lance that is invading
content.content: Уничтожьте вторгающиеся силы врага

content.original: Destroy invading lance
content.prevOriginal: Destroy invading lance
content.content: Уничтожить отряд вторжения

content.original: Destroy the lance that is occupying the base
content.prevOriginal: Destroy the lance that is occupying the base
content.content: Уничтожьте отряд, удерживающий базу

content.original: Destroy occupying lance
content.prevOriginal: Destroy occupying lance
content.content: Уничтожить отряд захватчиков

content.original: Survive the hacked turrets in bravo base
content.prevOriginal: Survive the hacked turrets in bravo base
content.content: Защитить взломанные турели на базе браво

content.original: Destroy the hacked base turrets
content.prevOriginal: Destroy the hacked base turrets
content.content: Уничтожьте турели взломанной базы

content.original: One of our bio research stations has gone dark in the {TGT_SYSTEM.name} system. We've not sure why but {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.Demonym} affiliated groups have been asking about purchasing some specific supplies we also use in that system. Investigate and find out what's going on.
content.prevOriginal: One of our bio research stations has gone dark in the {TGT_SYSTEM.name} system. We've not sure why but {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.Demonym} affiliated groups have been asking about purchasing some specific supplies we also use in that system. Investigate and find out what's going on.
content.content: Одна из наших био-исследовательских станций в системе {TGT_SYSTEM.name} прекратила связь. Мы не знаем причину, однако не так давно влиятельные люди из {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.Name} выражали желание заполучить ценные материалы, которыми мы сами там пользуемся. Отправляйтесь туда и выясните, что там происходит.

content.original: At High Noon
content.prevOriginal: At High Noon
content.content: Точно в полдень

content.original: These guys aren't inexperienced so watch out and good luck, Commander.
content.prevOriginal: These guys aren't inexperienced so watch out and good luck, Commander.
content.content: У этих ребят есть опыт, так что будьте осторожны и удачи, командир.

content.original: Way to go, Commander! I even managed to record that for the crew's holovid room!
content.prevOriginal: Way to go, Commander! I even managed to record that for the crew's holovid room!
content.content: Way to go, Commander! I even managed to record that for the crew's holovid room!

content.original: These brothers are a lot better than we gave them credit for.
content.prevOriginal: These brothers are a lot better than we gave them credit for.
content.content: Эти братья намного лучше, чем мы думали.

content.original: Think you Mercfaces canna beat us twos? Hella no. Eat lead.
content.prevOriginal: Think you Mercfaces canna beat us twos? Hella no. Eat lead.
content.content: Think you Mercfaces canna beat us twos? Hella no. Eat lead.

content.original: Straight out of the holovids, Commander. A showdown at high noon... or whatever time it will be on {TGT_SYSTEM.name}.
content.prevOriginal: Straight out of the holovids, Commander. A showdown at high noon... or whatever time it will be on {TGT_SYSTEM.name}.
content.content: Прямо на головидео, командир. Поединок в полдень... или в другое время, на {TGT_SYSTEM.name}.

content.original: Defeat the Jarman brothers
content.prevOriginal: Defeat the Jarman brothers
content.content: Победите братьев Джарман

content.original: Our bases in {TGT_SYSTEM.name} have been plagued by the local Jarman brothers. With support from {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.ShortName} they continually raid our supplies and we've had enough. Using their overconfidence against them we've baited them into accepting a duel with us. Can you help us out?
content.prevOriginal: Our bases in {TGT_SYSTEM.name} have been plagued by the local Jarman brothers. With support from {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.ShortName} they continually raid our supplies and we've had enough. Using their overconfidence against them we've baited them into accepting a duel with us. Can you help us out?
content.content: Наши базы в {TGT_SYSTEM.name} подверглись нападению местных, братьев Джарман. При поддержке {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.ShortName} они постоянно грабят наши припасы, и с нас достаточно. Используя их самоуверенность, мы заставили их согласиться на дуэль с нами. Вы можете нам помочь?

content.original: Double Trouble
content.prevOriginal: Double Trouble
content.content: Двойные проблемы

content.original: Ready up, Commander.
content.prevOriginal: Ready up, Commander.
content.content: Закончили, командир.

content.original: It's unfortunate how this has turned out but we can't back down now. Sort these {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.Demonym} guards out then let's get out of here.
content.prevOriginal: It's unfortunate how this has turned out but we can't back down now. Sort these {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.Demonym} guards out then let's get out of here.
content.content: К сожалению, все таким образом, но мы не можем отступить сейчас. Разберите этих стражников из {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.Name}, и убираемся отсюда.

content.original: Glad you did it, Commander but time to run! Reports of this duel are reaching the airwaves.
content.prevOriginal: Glad you did it, Commander but time to run! Reports of this duel are reaching the airwaves.
content.content: Рад, что вы это сделали, командир, но пора бежать! Сообщения об этой дуэли достигли эфира.

content.original: This isn't how it should have turned out, Commander. Let's get going. Nothing more we can do.
content.prevOriginal: This isn't how it should have turned out, Commander. Let's get going. Nothing more we can do.
content.content: Все должно было быть не так, командир. Давайте продолжим. Мы больше ничего не можем здесь сделать.

content.original: Commander, looks like those two guys that the {TEAM_EMP.FactionDef.Demonym} crew ticked off last night were actually {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.Demonym} guards. Looks like we've got ourselves a duel.
content.prevOriginal: Commander, looks like those two guys that the {TEAM_EMP.FactionDef.Demonym} crew ticked off last night were actually {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.Demonym} guards. Looks like we've got ourselves a duel.
content.content: Командир, похоже, что те двое парней, которых команда {TEAM_EMP.FactionDef.Name} встретила прошлой ночью, на самом деле были стражниками {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.Name}. Кажеться, дуэль все таки состоиться.

content.original: Defeat Guards
content.prevOriginal: Defeat Guards
content.content: Победить стражников

content.original: Last night a few of our crew members took some much needed R&R at the local {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.Demonym} bar. Words were said and now it looks like we're stuck in a duel with two apparent {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.Demonym} guards. Our crew aren't fighters so maybe you can help us out?
content.prevOriginal: Last night a few of our crew members took some much needed R&R at the local {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.Demonym} bar. Words were said and now it looks like we're stuck in a duel with two apparent {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.Demonym} guards. Our crew aren't fighters so maybe you can help us out?
content.content: Вчера вечером несколько членов нашей команды отдыхали в местном баре {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.Name}. Были сказаны некоторые слова, и теперь похоже, что мы подписали себе дуэль с двумя стражниками {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.Name}. Мы не бойцы, но может быть, вы нам поможете?

content.original: Festive Couple
content.prevOriginal: Festive Couple
content.content: Праздничная пара

content.original: The crowd is cheering for you two, Commander.
content.prevOriginal: The crowd is cheering for you two, Commander.
content.content: Толпа болеет за вас двоих, командир.

content.original: Hah! That was a great show, Commander. Great job!
content.prevOriginal: Hah! That was a great show, Commander. Great job!
content.content: Ха! Это было отличное шоу, командир. Отличная работа!

content.original: I think we've just rained on the festival celebrations with this loss.
content.prevOriginal: I think we've just rained on the festival celebrations with this loss.
content.content: Думаю, мы только что нарушили фестивальное торжество этой потерей.

content.original: Let's make this a good show but make no mistake. We're winning this!
content.prevOriginal: Let's make this a good show but make no mistake. We're winning this!
content.content: Давайте устроим хорошее шоу, но без глупостей. Мы выиграем!

content.original: This actually sounds like fun! I'll have you both on coms the entire time but the rest of the crew will be cheering you on from the crowd. Let's do this, Commander.
content.prevOriginal: This actually sounds like fun! I'll have you both on coms the entire time but the rest of the crew will be cheering you on from the crowd. Let's do this, Commander.
content.content: Звучит весело! Я буду на связи с вами все время, но остальная часть команды будет подбадривать вас из толпы. Давайте сделаем это, командир.

content.original: Defeat the {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.Demonym} team
content.prevOriginal: Defeat the {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.Demonym} team
content.content: Победите команду {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.Name}

content.original: As with every year at this festive time on {TGT_SYSTEM.name} we host an arena fight for the people. This year we'd like you to be our representative. Your duo duel is against {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.ShortName}. We're placing our trust in you so please don't let us down.
content.prevOriginal: As with every year at this festive time on {TGT_SYSTEM.name} we host an arena fight for the people. This year we'd like you to be our representative. Your duo duel is against {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.ShortName}. We're placing our trust in you so please don't let us down.
content.content: Каждый год в это праздничное время, на {TGT_SYSTEM.name}, мы устраиваем бой на арене для людей. В этом году мы хотим, чтобы вы были нашим представителем. Ваш дуэльный поединок против {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.ShortName}. Мы доверяем вам, поэтому, пожалуйста, не подведите нас.

content.original: Last Minute Replacements
content.prevOriginal: Last Minute Replacements
content.content: Замены в последнюю минуту

content.original: Looks like those expert duelists are waiting for you. Good luck, Commander.
content.prevOriginal: Looks like those expert duelists are waiting for you. Good luck, Commander.
content.content: Похоже, тебя ждут опытные дуэлянты. Удачи, командир.

content.original: And down they go! Fantastic display, Commander.
content.prevOriginal: And down they go! Fantastic display, Commander.
content.content: И они падают! Фантастическое зрелище, командир.

content.original: Let's get you out of here, Commander. It couldn't be helped.
content.prevOriginal: Let's get you out of here, Commander. It couldn't be helped.
content.content: Давай вытаскивать тебя отсюда, командир. Ничего не поделаешь.

content.original: Finally! We thought you both had chickened out.
content.prevOriginal: Finally! We thought you both had chickened out.
content.content: Ну наконец то! Мы думали, вы оба струсили.

content.original: So, pick up the mess AND give away the credit. What a raw situation. At least the MRB knows the deal.
content.prevOriginal: So, pick up the mess AND give away the credit. What a raw situation. At least the MRB knows the deal.
content.content: Итак, соберись и отдай им должное. Работаем грубо. По крайней мере, MRBС знает о сделке.

content.original: Defeat the duelists
content.prevOriginal: Defeat the duelists
content.content: Победите дуэлянтов

content.original: We're in a bit of trouble. Two of our pilots challenged two long standing {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.Demonym} duelists to a fight. Only now our pilots are nowhere to be found. Can you step in and take their spots please? Of course, you'd have to pretend to be our pilots.
content.prevOriginal: We're in a bit of trouble. Two of our pilots challenged two long standing {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.Demonym} duelists to a fight. Only now our pilots are nowhere to be found. Can you step in and take their spots please? Of course, you'd have to pretend to be our pilots.
content.content: У нас маленькая проблема. Два наших пилота бросили вызов давним дуэлянтам {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.Name}. И сейчас наших пилотов нигде нет. Не могли бы вы занять их места, пожалуйста? И конечно, вам придется прикинуться нашими пилотами.

content.original: Words Hurt
content.prevOriginal: Words Hurt
content.content: Слова ранят

content.original: The duelists are out there on the other side of the arena. Good luck, Commander.
content.prevOriginal: The duelists are out there on the other side of the arena. Good luck, Commander.
content.content: Дуэлянты на другой стороне арены. Удачи, командир.

content.original: There we go. Issue settled. Back to the dropship, Commander.
content.prevOriginal: There we go. Issue settled. Back to the dropship, Commander.
content.content: Ну вот. Вопрос решен. Возвращайтесь к десантному кораблю, командир.

content.original: This isn't how things should be. You shouldn't be able to repress the truth like this.
content.prevOriginal: This isn't how things should be. You shouldn't be able to repress the truth like this.
content.content: Так не должно быть. Вы не сможете подавить истину вот так.

content.original: You will retract that report. Right. Now.
content.prevOriginal: You will retract that report. Right. Now.
content.content: Вы опровергнете этот отчет. Верно. Сейчас.

content.original: I just don't know, Commander. When people say they want to 'fight' allegations it's not meant to be a real fight. This {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.Demonym} Governor is crazy. Let's uphold the truth... for a price.
content.prevOriginal: I just don't know, Commander. When people say they want to 'fight' allegations it's not meant to be a real fight. This {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.Demonym} Governor is crazy. Let's uphold the truth... for a price.
content.content: Я не знаю, командир. Когда люди говорят, что хотят «бороться» с обвинениями, это не должно означать настоящую борьбу. Этот губернатор {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.Name} псих. Давайте отстаивать правду... за некоторую цену.

content.original: Defeat the duelists
content.prevOriginal: Defeat the duelists
content.content: Победите дуэлянтов

content.original: We've been informed by one of the largest news networks that a {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.Demonym} Governor has taken issue with a recently released report on military fund spending irregularities. She's demanded a duel to fight those allegations. We'd like to hire you to represent and uphold that worthy news report, Commander.
content.prevOriginal: We've been informed by one of the largest news networks that a {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.Demonym} Governor has taken issue with a recently released report on military fund spending irregularities. She's demanded a duel to fight those allegations. We'd like to hire you to represent and uphold that worthy news report, Commander.
content.content: Одна из крупнейших новостных сетей проинформировала нас, что губернатор {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.Name} выразил недовольство недавно опубликованным отчетом о нарушениях в расходах военного бюджета. Она потребовала дуэли для опровержения обвинений. Они хотели бы нанять вас, чтобы вы представляли и поддерживали этот отчет, командир.

content.original: Yearly Tussle
content.prevOriginal: Yearly Tussle
content.content: Ежегодная схватка

content.original: Our employers have won this every year for the past four years. No pressure, Commander.
content.prevOriginal: Our employers have won this every year for the past four years. No pressure, Commander.
content.content: Последние четрые года подряд наши работодатели побеждали. Никакого давления, командир.

content.original: You did it! Time to organise the party. We can't let all this go to waste!
content.prevOriginal: You did it! Time to organise the party. We can't let all this go to waste!
content.content: Ты сделал это! Пора организовать вечеринку. Мы не можем позволить всему этому пропасть зря!

content.original: Our employers can't expect to win this every year I suppose.
content.prevOriginal: Our employers can't expect to win this every year I suppose.
content.content: Полагаю, наши наниматели понимают, что не смогут выигрывать вечно.

content.original: Ready yourself, Mercs. We've got a reputation to uphold and an appetite to satisfy.
content.prevOriginal: Ready yourself, Mercs. We've got a reputation to uphold and an appetite to satisfy.
content.content: Готовьтесь, наемники. Нам нужно поддерживать репутацию и удовлетворять аппетиты.

content.original: What do you think? Maybe we can get some of this good food and fine wine as part of the deal!
content.prevOriginal: What do you think? Maybe we can get some of this good food and fine wine as part of the deal!
content.content: Как думаешь? Может быть, нам дадут хорошей еды и прекрасного вина в рамках сделки!

content.original: Defeat Duelists
content.prevOriginal: Defeat Duelists
content.content: Победить дуэлянтов

content.original: Every year we {TEAM_EMP.FactionDef.Demonym}s in {TGT_SYSTEM.name} continue a historic procedure with the local {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.Demonym}s. We both field mercenaries and whoever wins claims a years worth of good food and fine wines. Our usual mercenaries who help us were recently and unexpectedly wiped out by a failed jumpship jump, so we've come to you for help.
content.prevOriginal: Every year we {TEAM_EMP.FactionDef.Demonym}s in {TGT_SYSTEM.name} continue a historic procedure with the local {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.Demonym}s. We both field mercenaries and whoever wins claims a years worth of good food and fine wines. Our usual mercenaries who help us were recently and unexpectedly wiped out by a failed jumpship jump, so we've come to you for help.
content.content: Каждый год мы {TEAM_EMP.FactionDef.Name} в {TGT_SYSTEM.name} продолжаем традицию с местными {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.Name}. Мы оба наемники, и тот, кто победит, целый год пробует хорошую еду и прекрасное вино. Наемники, к которым мы обычно обращались, недавно были неожиданно уничтожены неудачным прыжком с трамплина, поэтому мы обратились к вам за помощью.

content.original: All Eyes On
content.prevOriginal: All Eyes On
content.content: Всё внимание на

content.original: Here we go, Commander.
content.prevOriginal: Here we go, Commander.
content.content: Поехали, командир.

content.original: You're all set up to be recorded and analysed. Time to show them a thing or two, Commander.
content.prevOriginal: You're all set up to be recorded and analysed. Time to show them a thing or two, Commander.
content.content: Все готово для записи и анализа. Пора показать им кое-что, командир.

content.original: And there we go. I expect to see a lot more of those moves in the future. Guess we should be ready for that ourselves.
content.prevOriginal: And there we go. I expect to see a lot more of those moves in the future. Guess we should be ready for that ourselves.
content.content: И вот так. Я ожидаю увидеть намного больше таких шагов в будущем. Думаю, мы должны быть готовы к этому сами.

content.original: Let's get out of here. I guess they won't be using that data after all.
content.prevOriginal: Let's get out of here. I guess they won't be using that data after all.
content.content: Давайте выбираться отсюда. Думаю, они не будут использовать эту информацию.

content.original: There's worse ways to make money than influencing a whole new generation of pilot's fighting styles. Sounds fun!
content.prevOriginal: There's worse ways to make money than influencing a whole new generation of pilot's fighting styles. Sounds fun!
content.content: Есть способы заработать деньги и похуже, чем повлиять на новое поколение боевых стилей пилотов. Звучит весело!

content.original: Overcome the test subject
content.prevOriginal: Overcome the test subject
content.content: Overcome the test subject

content.original: Commander, you've been very active. Active and successful. We're developing a new type of BattleMech simulator and we need new and improved data. Sound interesting? Good, because we want to analyse how you fight {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.Demonym} forces. We've arranged for an ex-{TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.Demonym} pilot to fight you for a data gathering exercise. What do you say? You'll be well rewarded.
content.prevOriginal: Commander, you've been very active. Active and successful. We're developing a new type of BattleMech simulator and we need new and improved data. Sound interesting? Good, because we want to analyse how you fight {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.Demonym} forces. We've arranged for an ex-{TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.Demonym} pilot to fight you for a data gathering exercise. What do you say? You'll be well rewarded.
content.content: Командир, вы были очень активны. Активны и успешны. Мы разрабатываем новый тип симулятора боевых роботов, и нам нужны новые и улучшенные данные. Звучит интересно? Хорошо, потому что мы хотим проанализировать, как вы сражаетесь с силами {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.Name}. Мы договорились, что бывший пилот{TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.Name} будет сражаться с вами за сбор данных. Что скажешь? Вы будете хорошо вознаграждены.

content.original: A Taste For War
content.prevOriginal: A Taste For War
content.content: Вкус к войне

content.original: Here we go, Commander.
content.prevOriginal: Here we go, Commander.
content.content: Поехали, командир.

content.original: All the holo-cams are focused on you guys so put up a show but finish that {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.Demonym} champion in style.
content.prevOriginal: All the holo-cams are focused on you guys so put up a show but finish that {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.Demonym} champion in style.
content.content: Все голокамеры направлены на вас, ребята, так что устройте шоу, и добейте с шиком этого чемпиона {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.Name}.

content.original: Good job, Commander! That should put to rest any doubts on our skill.
content.prevOriginal: Good job, Commander! That should put to rest any doubts on our skill.
content.content: Хорошая работа, командир! Это развееть любые сомнения в нашем мастерстве.

content.original: Well... at least we didn't go down without a fight. Let's hope the holo-cams got your good side, Commander.
content.prevOriginal: Well... at least we didn't go down without a fight. Let's hope the holo-cams got your good side, Commander.
content.content: Ну... по крайней мере, мы не сдались без боя. Будем надеяться, что голокамеры на вашей стороне командир.

content.original: Commander, this seems like a straight up duel. It's based in an established arena so I guess it's as good as we'll get to 'safe'.
content.prevOriginal: Commander, this seems like a straight up duel. It's based in an established arena so I guess it's as good as we'll get to 'safe'.
content.content: Командир, это похоже на честную дуэль. Она проходит на известной арене, так что я думаю, что это так же хорошо, как и безопасно.

content.original: Destroy Enemy Champion
content.prevOriginal: Destroy Enemy Champion
content.content: Уничтожить вражеского чемпиона

content.original: A prized {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.Demonym} Gladiator has challenged you to solo combat, Commander. The holovid rights have already been sold to the highest bidder and we've already been wired a cut. We can't turn this chance down so we hope you can't too! We'll throw in the holo-vid footage for {COMPANY.CompanyName}'s promotional vids.
content.prevOriginal: A prized {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.Demonym} Gladiator has challenged you to solo combat, Commander. The holovid rights have already been sold to the highest bidder and we've already been wired a cut. We can't turn this chance down so we hope you can't too! We'll throw in the holo-vid footage for {COMPANY.CompanyName}'s promotional vids.
content.content: Призёр {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.Name} Гладиатор вызвал вас на поединок, командир. Права на головид уже проданы тому, кто предложил самую высокую цену, и мы уже получили долю. Мы не можем отказаться от этого шанса, поэтому мы надеемся, что вы тоже не упустите! Мы добавим голо-вид материалы для рекламных роликов компании {COMPANY.CompanyName}.

content.original: Challenge Accepted
content.prevOriginal: Challenge Accepted
content.content: Вызов принят

content.original: That's the one, Commander. Take him out.
content.prevOriginal: That's the one, Commander. Take him out.
content.content: Это тот, командир. Убери его.

content.original: Done and done. Great job, Commander. Let's go home.
content.prevOriginal: Done and done. Great job, Commander. Let's go home.
content.content: Сделано и сделано. Отличная работа, командир. Давай пойдем домой.

content.original: We're coming in to pick you up fast, Commander. Hold on. We'll sort out the political fallout from this later.
content.prevOriginal: We're coming in to pick you up fast, Commander. Hold on. We'll sort out the political fallout from this later.
content.content: Мы спешим за вами, командир. Держитесь. С политическими последствиями разберемся позже.

content.original: I know they said they were going to send a proxy but, a lowly Merc? What a waste of a perfectly good duel.
content.prevOriginal: I know they said they were going to send a proxy but, a lowly Merc? What a waste of a perfectly good duel.
content.content: Я знаю, что они сказали, что собираются отправить доверенное лицо, но наемника? Какая трата прекрасной дуэли.

content.original: No ammo left? What kind of idiot set up their supply lines. Let's clean this duel up and cash in, Commander.
content.prevOriginal: No ammo left? What kind of idiot set up their supply lines. Let's clean this duel up and cash in, Commander.
content.content: Боеприпасы кончились? Что за идиот прокладывал линии снабжения. Командир, давайте победим в дуэли и заработаем денег.

content.original: Destroy Duelist Commander
content.prevOriginal: Destroy Duelist Commander
content.content: Уничтожить командира-дуэлянта

content.original: Over the past few weeks we've been engaged in small stage skirmishes with {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.ShortName} in and around {TGT_SYSTEM.name}. The company commander must feel they can't continue their campaign because they've requested a duel to claim this local forward base. Little do they know that we've recently run out of supplies so we've very much taken them up on their offer. This is where you come in. We need to you win this for us, Commander.
content.prevOriginal: Over the past few weeks we've been engaged in small stage skirmishes with {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.ShortName} in and around {TGT_SYSTEM.name}. The company commander must feel they can't continue their campaign because they've requested a duel to claim this local forward base. Little do they know that we've recently run out of supplies so we've very much taken them up on their offer. This is where you come in. We need to you win this for us, Commander.
content.content: За последние несколько недель мы участвовали в небольших стычках с {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.ShortName} внутри и вокруг {TGT_SYSTEM.name}. Их командир понимает, что они не могут продолжать свою кампанию, потому они запросили дуэль, чтобы захватить эту местную передовую базу. Откуда им было знать, что у нас недавно закончились запасы, поэтому нам выгоднее это предложение. И вот тут ваш выход. Нам нужно, чтобы вы выиграли для нас, командир.

content.original: Cornered Revenge
content.prevOriginal: Cornered Revenge
content.content: Месть в трудном положении

content.original: Last time we saw Killbox she was stuck on that moon, Commander. Not sure how they got off it. Guess it doesn't matter now. Good luck!
content.prevOriginal: Last time we saw Killbox she was stuck on that moon, Commander. Not sure how they got off it. Guess it doesn't matter now. Good luck!
content.content: В последний мы видели Киллбокс застрявшей на той луне, командир. Не знаю, как они выбрались. Думаю, теперь это не имеет значения. Удачи!

content.original: I'm glad you got out of that in one piece, Commander. Victories like this feel hollow though.
content.prevOriginal: I'm glad you got out of that in one piece, Commander. Victories like this feel hollow though.
content.content: Я рад, что вы вышли из этого целым, командир. Однако такие победы кажутся пустыми.

content.original: Killbox! We've got our lances incoming to wipe you out if you go any further. Leave now!
content.prevOriginal: Killbox! We've got our lances incoming to wipe you out if you go any further. Leave now!
content.content: Киллбокс! Наши копья готовы уничтожить вас, если вы пойдете дальше. Уходите сейчас же!

content.original: Never thought you'd see me again, Commander? You wouldn't if it wasn't for {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.ShortName} helping me off that forsaken moon. I can't forgive you for what you did. Now... unlike last time - let's finish this once and for all!
content.prevOriginal: Never thought you'd see me again, Commander? You wouldn't if it wasn't for {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.ShortName} helping me off that forsaken moon. I can't forgive you for what you did. Now... unlike last time - let's finish this once and for all!
content.content: Никогда не думали, что снова увидите меня, командир? {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.ShortName} помог мне спастись с той заброшенной луны. Я не могу простить то, что ты сделал. Теперь... все будет по другому - покончим с этим раз и навсегда!

content.original: 'Killbox'? Haven't heard that name for a long time. Do you think she's still upset after all these years?
content.prevOriginal: Killbox'? Haven't heard that name for a long time. Do you think she's still upset after all these years?
content.content: Киллбокс! Давно я не слышал этого имени. Думаешь, она все еще расстроена после стольких лет?

content.original: Defeat Killbox
content.prevOriginal: Defeat Killbox
content.content: Победить Киллбокс

content.original: We have a BattleMech causing us trouble in {TGT_SYSTEM.name} who refuses to back down until you, Commander, show up and fight them in a duel. They call themselves Killbox. I don't know what their problem is with you but we'll pay you to get here and just deal with them. It's causing us a headache.
content.prevOriginal: We have a BattleMech causing us trouble in {TGT_SYSTEM.name} who refuses to back down until you, Commander, show up and fight them in a duel. They call themselves Killbox. I don't know what their problem is with you but we'll pay you to get here and just deal with them. It's causing us a headache.
content.content: У нас есть проблемы с мехом в {TGT_SYSTEM.name}, который отказывается отступать, пока вы, командир, не появитесь и не сразитесь с ним на дуэли. Называет себя Киллбокс. Я не знаю, в чем дело, но мы заплатим вам, чтобы вы пришли сюда и разобрались. У нас голова болит из-за этого.

content.original: Life Lesson
content.prevOriginal: Life Lesson
content.content: Жизненый урок

content.original: There he is, Commander.
content.prevOriginal: There he is, Commander.
content.content: Вот он, командир.

content.original: This might be a real easy job but it's a job all the same. Knock him about a bit then finish things up. His Dad will be happier than he'll be.
content.prevOriginal: This might be a real easy job but it's a job all the same. Knock him about a bit then finish things up. His Dad will be happier than he'll be.
content.content: Это может быть легкая работа, но все равно это работа. Поколотите его, а затем закончите дело. Его отец будет счастливее, чем он.

content.original: He should get over his shock in a week or so, Commander. He might be sore for a bit longer.
content.prevOriginal: He should get over his shock in a week or so, Commander. He might be sore for a bit longer.
content.content: Он должен преодолеть шок примерно через неделю, командир. Он может болеть еще немного.

content.original: That was unexpected, Commander. I don't think his Dad will pay up since we've just subjected him to a few years of bragging.
content.prevOriginal: That was unexpected, Commander. I don't think his Dad will pay up since we've just subjected him to a few years of bragging.
content.content: Это было неожиданно, командир. Я не думаю, что его отец заплатит, так как мы обличили его двухлетнее хвастовство.

content.original: So you're the rubbish my father is sending to train against? Just like the other servants... pitiful.
content.prevOriginal: So you're the rubbish my father is sending to train against? Just like the other servants... pitiful.
content.content: Так ты мусор, что прислал против меня отец? Как и другие слуги... ничтожество.

content.original: I have to hand it to this guy. At least he cares enough about his son to teach him a thing or two. Even if that means a knock on the head... or two.
content.prevOriginal: I have to hand it to this guy. At least he cares enough about his son to teach him a thing or two. Even if that means a knock on the head... or two.
content.content: Отдать должное этому парню. По крайней мере, он достаточно заботится о своем сыне, чтобы научить его кое-чему. Даже если это означает удар по голове... или два.

content.original: Destroy Arrogant Step-Son's Mech
content.prevOriginal: Destroy Arrogant Step-Son's Mech
content.content: Уничтожьте мех высокомерного пасынка

content.original: A rich {TEAM_EMP.FactionDef.Demonym} business man has requested that we show his arrogant step-son what real fighting feels like. We thought {COMPANY.CompanyName} could help us here. Don't hold back. This father wants to teach a real life lesson - especially for his {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.Demonym} side of the family.
content.prevOriginal: A rich {TEAM_EMP.FactionDef.Demonym} business man has requested that we show his arrogant step-son what real fighting feels like. We thought {COMPANY.CompanyName} could help us here. Don't hold back. This father wants to teach a real life lesson - especially for his {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.Demonym} side of the family.
content.content: Богатый бизнесмен {TEAM_EMP.FactionDef.Name} попросил, чтобы мы показали его высокомерному пасынку, что такое настоящая борьба. Мы подумали, что {COMPANY.CompanyName} может нам здесь помочь. Не сдерживайся. Этот отец хочет преподать урок из реальной жизни - особенно для своих {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.Name} родственников.

content.original: Proxy War
content.prevOriginal: Proxy War
content.content: Доверенная война

content.original: At least we're keeping casualties down to a minimum here. Good luck, Commander.
content.prevOriginal: At least we're keeping casualties down to a minimum here. Good luck, Commander.
content.content: По крайней мере, здесь мы сводим потери к минимуму. Удачи, командир.

content.original: Job done and we've saved some stuck up Governor their job. Time to get some rest, Commander.
content.prevOriginal: Job done and we've saved some stuck up Governor their job. Time to get some rest, Commander.
content.content: Работа сделана и мы спасли заносчивого губернатора. Пора немного отдохнуть, командир.

content.original: Well, they did say they weren't going to acknowledge a loss. See how that works out. Let's get you back to the dropship, Commander.
content.prevOriginal: Well, they did say they weren't going to acknowledge a loss. See how that works out. Let's get you back to the dropship, Commander.
content.content: Ну, они сказали, что не собирались признавать потерю. Посмотрим что из этого выйдет. Возвращайтесь к десантному кораблю, командир.

content.original: In the name of {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.ShortName} I hereby challenge you to this war for {TGT_SYSTEM.name}! To the victor the spoils!
content.prevOriginal: In the name of {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.ShortName} I hereby challenge you to this war for {TGT_SYSTEM.name}! To the victor the spoils!
content.content: От имени {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.ShortName} я призываю вас на эту войну за {TGT_SYSTEM.name}! Награда достанется победителю!

content.original: 'Don't want to risk anything here?' I think they forget that we're putting our necks on the line. I suppose if the pay is good that's what we do.
content.prevOriginal: Don't want to risk anything here?' I think they forget that we're putting our necks on the line. I suppose if the pay is good that's what we do.
content.content: Не хотят здесь рисковать?' Думаю, они забывают, что это мы рискуем шеями. Если нам хорошо заплатят, то, я думаю, мы этим занимаемся.

content.original: Defeat the {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.Demonym} duelist
content.prevOriginal: Defeat the {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.Demonym} duelist
content.content: Победите дуэлянта {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.Name}

content.original: The Governor of {TGT_SYSTEM.name} has been challenged to a proxy war duel by a rival {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.Demonym} Governor. We'd like you to be his proxy in this fight. If you lose, we'll just deny it was ever agreed to. We don't want to actually risk anything here.
content.prevOriginal: The Governor of {TGT_SYSTEM.name} has been challenged to a proxy war duel by a rival {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.Demonym} Governor. We'd like you to be his proxy in this fight. If you lose, we'll just deny it was ever agreed to. We don't want to actually risk anything here.
content.content: Губернатор {TGT_SYSTEM.name} был вызван на дуэль конкурирующим губернатором {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.Name}. Мы бы хотели, чтобы вы были его представителем в этой битве. Если вы проиграете, мы будем отрицать наше соглашение. Мы не хотим рисковать.
